content: So, it is so stealthy they had to install radar reflectors so vessels in shipping lanes can see them. Hmmm. Sonar doesn’t work as well in blue or deep water. Man, you got to follow the money on this one!

author: Willy
content:
It isnt the ship yards fault for doing what some one in the Navy thought would be a “good idea”. The shipyard said “yes we will build what your blueprints ask us to do”. Otherwise the shipyard can only recommend what should be changed from the history of making ships as far back as WWII.

Yup, some one else jumped ship hoping they were not to blame for this screwup.
